Minimal.title: Emotional Wellness is Good
Minimal.description: Your results suggest you aren't currently experiencing significant symptoms of depression. Maintaining this balance is key.

tips.title: Daily Check-ins
tips.description: Keep tracking your mood to spot any changes early.

tips.title: Stay Active
tips.description: Regular physical activity helps maintain positive mental health.

tips.title: Social Connection
tips.description: Continue nurturing relationships with friends and family.

Mild.title: Mild Depressive Symptoms
Mild.description: You're experiencing some mild symptoms. These are common but worth monitoring to prevent them from worsening.

tips.title: Sleep Hygiene
tips.description: Focus on getting regular, quality sleep as it greatly impacts mood.

tips.title: Structured Routine
tips.description: Creating a daily schedule can provide a sense of control and purpose.

tips.title: Limit Stress
tips.description: Identify minor stressors and practice relaxation techniques.

Moderate.title: Moderate Depressive Symptoms
Moderate.description: Your symptoms may be starting to impact your daily life. Proactive steps and support can help manage this.

tips.title: Behavioral Activation
tips.description: Gently push yourself to do small activities you used to enjoy, even if you don't feel like it.

tips.title: Talk to Someone
tips.description: Sharing your feelings with a trusted friend or family member can lighten the burden.

tips.title: Mindfulness
tips.description: Practice staying in the present moment to reduce negative thought loops.

Moderately severe.title: Significant Symptoms
Moderately severe.description: You are experiencing symptoms that likely make daily activities difficult. Professional support is highly recommended.

tips.title: Seek Professional Help
tips.description: Consider consulting a therapist or doctor to discuss treatment options.

tips.title: Break Tasks Down
tips.description: Divide big tasks into tiny, manageable steps to avoid overwhelm.

tips.title: Self-Compassion
tips.description: Be kind to yourself. You are dealing with a difficult challenge, not a personal failure.

Severe.title: Severe Depressive Symptoms
Severe.description: These results indicate severe symptoms. It is very important to seek professional help immediately.

tips.title: Contact a Professional
tips.description: Please reach out to a doctor or mental health professional as soon as possible.

tips.title: Crisis Support
tips.description: If you feel unsafe, please contact emergency services or a crisis hotline immediately.

tips.title: Simplify Life
tips.description: Focus only on immediate necessities and let go of other obligations for now.
